s.text: He's clearly ever the smart business man.
He's clearly ever the smart business man.
He's clearly ever the smart business man.

While the local paper chases a story involving the Mayor, the FBI, and the waterfront, the Wall Street Journal finds in the same waterfront a tale of a city re-inventing itself through heroic redevelopment.
In the Examiner story, port director Doug Wong appears scheduling a hearing about one of Charlie Walker's crony's development projects, which is apparently now under investigation.
